blogs.title: Is spider silk the fabric of the future?
blogs.summary:

news.title: Synthetic spider silk could be the biggest technological advance in clothing since nylon
news.summary: Spider silk’s qualities are nearly mythical. Its tensile strength is comparable to steel’s.
